thread.section_title: Bake Me A Wish! Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bake Me A Wish! | www.bakemeawish.com
thread.title: Heather
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by Heather

author: Heather
title: Heather
text: I sent the cake to my Aunt Ann. She is used to getting the normal flowers and a card for her birthday, so she was delighted to get a cake. She shared it with her children and grandchildren, they all said it was delicious. Aunt Ann said that "it put chocolate in a whole new dimension". She truly loved it!
